description:
As Arajin keeps trying to capture Mahoro`s heart, the injured Marito invites him to a "group date" at the beach. Arajin agrees and buffs up for the party. When the day comes, Arajin realizes that he was set to `date` very different partners... in battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goukon!? Umi to Maji Babu to Watashi!
Group Date?! The Sea, Maji Croquette, and I!
Ça va choper ? La plage, les purs kebabs et moi !
合コン!? 海とマジバブと私!
